## ViewExtensionManagerParams interface

Parameters passed into many of the extension methods with a view added.

Inherits from - [EditorViewParams](./core-types.editorviewparams.md) - [ExtensionManagerParams](./core-types.extensionmanagerparams.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ViewExtensionManagerParams<GSchema extends EditorSchema = any> extends EditorViewParams<GSchema>, ExtensionManagerParams<GSchema> 
```
